entry.title: Removing channel reserve for mobile wallet users
entry.summary: In the email, the sender mentions that they have reviewed some implementations, specifically lnd, and notes that it currently checks that the reserve is at least the dust limit. They find this requirement reasonable. However, they state that with the proposed protocol update, this requirement will need to be modified. The sender expresses their anticipation for the Blip, which is likely a reference to an upcoming communication or announcement related to the protocol update.
